Mbali Dhlamini (amụrụ n'afọ 1990 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa. Ọ na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na foto na oge. Site n'afọ 2008 ruo afọ 2009, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ obibi akwụkwọ na Artist Proof Studio na Johannesburg
Ọ gụrụ Visual Arts na Mahadum Johannesburg, ebe ọ nwetara Bachelor of Technology n'afọ 2013

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, Johannesburg, site n'afọ 2014, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Master of Arts n'afọ 2015. N'ọrụ ya, Dhlamini na-ekwu maka nsogbu ndị na-esote ọchịchị: na ime mmụọ (Series "Non-Promised Land: Bana Ba Thari Entsho") na nkà nke indigo dyeing na Senegal (Series"Look Into"). Site n'ọnwa Ọktoba ruo n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2021, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi n'ụlọ nke Embassy of Foreign Artists nke Swiss Canton nke Geneva. N'ọnwa Disemba 2021, ya na Phumulani Ntuli, natara Visionary Award nkè afọ 2021/2022 site na The Javett Art Centre na Mahadum Pretoria.
Mbali Dhlamini bi na Johannesburg.
